Text.Page:
Ever since I was a kid, my parents told me, "All those books will be the death of you!" Not exactly sophisticated, my family.

But they're right. A book will kill me, and you're going to help.

Atel Akaad has something called the "Book of the Abyss." To read it is to lose your soul. But if I can get to the end, we can learn a lot about what this whole conspiracy is about. I know the risks. There's a war going on! What's one life?

I can feel the power inside.

I'm going to read it...but slowly. The further I get, the more we'll learn.
